1.4.name: wordpress/youappi-smartapp
1.4.description:
By installing the smartAPP plugin and placing smartAPP widgets on your pages and posts you can:

  • Engage readers with the best free mobile apps
  • Earn money for clicks on mobile applications
  • Provide personalized recommendations to each user based on his/her reaction to the apps shown

With 150 mobile apps downloaded every second and 1,000 new mobile apps uploaded every day, the mobile app economy presents a fantastic monetization opportunity for mobile blogs and website owners.

With the latest smart phone penetration statistics, there is 80% chance that your readers have a smartphone and 50% chance that they are using it to read your blog or browse your website. Now, for the first time, by using the youAPPi smartAPP plugin, you can easily add the best new mobile application content to your blog, he
